description: A grasshopper sequence: closed under n -> 2n+2 and 6n+6.
references: C. Pickover, Computers and the Imagination, St. Martin's Press, NY, 1991, p. 353.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: Take[ Sort[ Flatten[ NestList[{2#+2, 6#+6} &, 1, 8]]], 55] (from Wouter L.J. Meeussen Mar 06 2005)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
extensions: Corrected and extended by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 20 2001
